Name: Work for the council

B. Login account > Apply for a job posting (online)

Sub-services: Browse volunteer profiles on website > People directed to library > Fill in paper form

Sub-services: Register for an account (online)

Name: Apply for a watercourse consent
Sub-services: Fill in form (online) > Upload docs > Pay (online) > Get result (email/post)

Name: (NT) Apply for a flood grant - Property Level Resilience grant
Sub-services:
A. Check eligibility (online) > Not eligible so leave

B. Check eligibility (online) > Eligible so fill in a form (online) > > wait to be contacted by supplier > Book an appointment for assessment (phone?) > Get home assessed? > Get the grant (via supplier)

Name: Apply to be on waiting list for plot of land for Gypsies and Travellers
Sub-services: Fill in form (paper) > Submit > Wait

Name: Apply for a new or extend a vehicle crossing or dropped kerb
Sub-services: Fill in the form (online)

Name: (NT) Apply to hang seasonal decorations from a lampost
Sub-services:
A. Download attachments > Mail it > Wait for answer
B. Download attachments > Email it > Wait for answer

Name: Request a written response about an enquiry on Highways Status
Sub-services:
A. Up to 1000m > Fill form (online)
B. From 1001m > Make request (email)

Name: Apply for a licence to plant
Sub-services:
A. Call > Get paper copy > Email
B. Call > Get paper copy > Mail

Name: (NT) Apply for a Blue Badge
Sub-services:
A. Check if eligible > If automatically eligible > Fill in form (online) and submit your documents > Get confirmation > Get decision (email/post)

B. Check if eligible > If not automatically eligible > Fill in form (online) and submit your documents > Get confirmation > Be invited to attend mobility assessment if service can't make decision w/out further assessment > Get decision of application (email/post)

Name: (NT) Request a review of the Blue Badge application decision
Sub-services: Email or post a written request > Might attend a mobility assessment > Get the final decision

Name: (NT) Apply for disabled parking bay
Sub-services: Fill in form (online) > Get assessment > ?

Name: Apply for a Traffic Regulation Order
Sub-services: Call

Name: Apply for a bus pass
Sub-services:
1. Download form > Fill it in (paper) > Mail it
2. Apply online 
3. Call

Name: Apply for a school place - step 02: Apply
Sub-services:
A. Register for an Education Portal account (Online) > Log into portal > Apply for a school place (online portal) > Receive application acknowledgement (email) > Wait > Check progress/status of application (online portal)

B. (after deadline/church school) Fill in form (paper) > Send application (email/post) > Receive acknowledgement of application (post/email) > Wait > Check progress/status of application (email)

Name: (NT) Apply for a school place - step 06: Request to apply to a school not on original application
Sub-services: A. Apply to a school not part of original application (email) > Wait > get offer (email) > Decide on offer (email if rejecting)

Name: (NT) Apply for a school place - step 07: Appeal decision > Submit appeal
Sub-services:
A. Fill in appeal form (online) > Recieve copy of appeal (email) > Send evidence (post if not part of online form) > Wait > Receive invitation for appeal hearing > Receive hearing pack (post)

B. Fill in appeal form (paper) > Send evidence (post)  Wait > Receive invitation for appeal hearing > Receive hearing pack (post)

Name: (NT) Apply for a mid-year school place
Sub-services: Fill in application form (online form) > Wait (15 days)  > Get offer (email/post)

Name: (NT) Apply for school transport for an under 16
Sub-services:
A. Fill in application form (online) > Email acknowledgement > Wait > Decision offered (up to 10 days) > Email acknowledgment

B. Fill in an application for faith school transport (paper) > Wait > Decision offered (up to 10 days) > Email acknowledgement

Name: (NT) Apply for school transport for an over 16
Sub-services: A. Fill in form (online/paper) > Submit (email/post) > Wait for decision if eligible > Get decision (post/email) > If eligible then receive a request for payment/invoice (email/post) > Pay (phone - credit/debit)

Name: (NT) Apply for SEND home to school transport
Sub-services: Check eligibility (online) > Fill in form (paper) > Submit (email/post) > Wait for decision if eligible > Get decision (post/email)

Name: Apply for travel training (person with SEND)
Sub-services: Fill in form (online) > Get response about 10 days later? (?)

Name: (NT) Apply for free school meals
Sub-services: Check/read eligibility  > Fill in form (online) > Receive acknowledgement of application > Receive outcome (10 days - post)

Name: (NT)Apply for school clothing grants (exceptional grants)
Sub-services: Request an application form (email) > Get form (email) > Fill in form (emailed) > Receive outome (post)

Name: Apply for free early years and childcare for 2 year olds
Sub-services: Register to portal account (online portal) > Login > Apply (online)

Name: Become a school governor
Sub-services: Apply to become a school governor (email)

Name: (NT) Apply for ACL financial support
Sub-services: Fill in form (paper) > Submit application (post) > Get result (?)

Name: (NT) Apply for childcare support fund (ACL)
Sub-services: Fill in form (paper) > Submit application (post) > Get result?

Name: (NT) Apply for learner support
Sub-services: Contact (email/phone) > Get assessment of needs (in person) > Get results ...>?

Name: (NT) Adult Social Care - apply for care and support
Sub-services: Call ASC > Get an assessment > Get a plan > Get a financial assessment > Have a personal budget defined

Name: (NT) Adult Social Care - apply to get support to buy aids and adaptations (under £1000)
Sub-services: Call ASC > Get a care needs assessment > Get a plan > Council will buy and cover the expense

Name: (NT) Adult Social Care - apply to get support to buy aids and adaptations (over £1000)
Sub-services: Call ASC > Get an assessment > Get a plan > Get a financial assessment > Have a personal budget defined > Buy

Name: (NT) Adult Social Care  - self-refer to care support services
Sub-services:
A. For visual impairment > Signposting from other services (eg, hospital) > Support service to call to confirm

B. For hearing impairment/deafblind > Self-referral online > Risk assessment phone call > Face-to-face assessment 

C. For hearing impairment/deafblind > Call to self-refer > Risk assessment phone call > Face-to-face assessment

Name: Adult Social Care - register a sensory impairment
Sub-services:
A. Call
B. Fill in form (online)

Name: (NT) Carers  - get an assessment
Sub-services:
A. Call > Have an assessment completed (face to face)
B. Call > Have an assessment completed (phone)

Name: (NT) Carers - register to Short Breaks
